source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_SEQ_00<tab>Edilaude looks as if she's ready to take on the world.
target: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_SEQ_00<tab>リズンソング文化区のエディロードは、不敵な笑みを浮かべている。

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_TODO_00<tab>Use the coal to light the fireworks on Quill's Trace.
target: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_TODO_00<tab>クウィル通りの<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB0A701 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E906A01 /var>を使う

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_TODO_01<tab>Use the coal to light the fireworks on the Mattock.
target: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB0A701 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E906A01 /var>を再度使う

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_TODO_02<tab>Use the coal to light the fireworks on the Abacus.
target: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB0A701 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E906A01 /var>をさらに使う

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_000<tab>If it isn't the savior of Ishgard, in the flesh! You couldn't have come at a better time. How would you like to assist the illustrious Edilaude, Ishgard's preeminent pyrotechnician, in her latest foray into the realm of sky-spanning aesthetic excellence?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_000<tab>ふっふっふ！
英雄の<var 08 E905 ((姉さん)) ((兄さん)) /var>、いいところにきたね！
これからの私の計画にぴったりだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_001<tab>Say no more─of course you would! Here, take this coal into hand and use it to set the masterpiece I've placed over on Quill's Trace aflame. I promise you, the result will be nothing short of scintillating!
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_001<tab>いいからいいから、この<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E906A01 /var>を、
蒼天街においてある<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB0A701 /var>に使ってきておくれよ！
悪いようにはしないからさ、ねっ！

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_005<tab>Well, what are you waiting for? Go and set my marvelous invention ablaze already! Every second you tarry, you deprive the world of my sheer aesthetic mastery!
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_005<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E906A01 /var>を、
蒼天街においてある<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB0A701 /var>に使ってきておくれよ！
悪いようにはしないからさ、ねっ！

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANA04005_000_010<tab>Oho! Now there's a sight to behold. Edilaude kept saying how she was slaving away in her workshop on the project of a lifetime, but I figured she was just blowing hot air again.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANA04005_000_010<tab>おお！　こりゃすごいや！
エディロードさんがこっそり作ってるって言ってたのは、
この花火だったんだねぇ！

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANA04005_000_011<tab>You honor us with your presence, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>. Just between you and me, I couldn't help but notice a similar-looking device sitting all alone atop the Mattock, and a group of children eagerly gathered around it. Perhaps Edilaude means to put on a show for them as well?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANA04005_000_011<tab>英雄さん！
「十字鍬通り」に、子どもたちが待ってるんだ！
良かったら、そっちでも花火を打ち上げてくれよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANA04005_000_020<tab>Edilaude just dropped this here and ran off laughing like a woman possessed. Whatever could it be?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANA04005_000_020<tab>エディロードさんが置いていったこの筒、
いったいなんなんだ……？

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANA04005_000_025<tab>I'm sure nothing would delight the children more than to see the sky filled with a blaze of colors.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANA04005_000_025<tab>英雄さん！
「十字鍬通り」に、子どもたちが待ってるんだ！
良かったら、そっちでも花火を打ち上げてくれよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANB04005_000_030<tab>The sky! It's sparkling! I've never seen anything so beautiful!
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANB04005_000_030<tab>キラキラしてる！　すごーい！
こんなにきれいなもの見たの、はじめて！

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANB04005_000_031<tab>Hey, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>! I saw another one of those tubes over on the Abacus. Do you think that one will make the sky light up, too?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANB04005_000_031<tab>そういえば、
「アバカス通り」にも、おんなじような筒があったよ！
<var 08 E905 ((お姉ちゃん)) ((お兄ちゃん)) /var>、やってやって！

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANB04005_000_045<tab>Come on, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>! Make the sky light up again!
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANB04005_000_045<tab>そういえば、
「アバカス通り」にも、おんなじような筒があったよ！
<var 08 E905 ((お姉ちゃん)) ((お兄ちゃん)) /var>、やってやって！

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANB04005_000_050<tab>Oh, what beautiful fireworks! I've not seen such a sight since...well, it's been many years. Still, what a lovely way to celebrate the restoration of the Firmament.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANB04005_000_050<tab>まぁ……！　美しい花火ねぇ……！
復興が完了した蒼天街のお祝いにぴったりだわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANB04005_000_051<tab>And how fitting is it that the one to ignite the blaze is none other than the very hero who delivered our fair nation from war? Thank you, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>. Do pass on my regards to dear Edilaude next time you see her.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANB04005_000_051<tab>それを、まさか英雄様が打ち上げてくださるなんて！
「エディロード」ちゃんったら、粋なことするわね。
あとでお礼を言いにいかなくっちゃ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANB04005_000_060<tab>Not a day goes past that I do not give thanks for all you have done for us, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>. But whatever brings you here today?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANB04005_000_060<tab>あらまぁ、英雄様じゃありませんの。
どうかされました？

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANB04005_000_065<tab>Truth be told, Edilaude's the daughter of a dear friend of mine. The girl's always been a touch eccentric, but she's got a good heart in her.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANB04005_000_065<tab>エディロードちゃんはね、私の友人の娘さんなのよ。
戦争が終わって、いまは母娘のふたりで暮らしているの。

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANB04005_000_066<tab>She fought bravely in the war, but I heard she was struggling to find good work in recent days. It's good to know she's found a new passion to pursue.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_ISHGARDIANB04005_000_066<tab>兵士としての働き口を失ってしまったらしいけれど、
新しい夢を追っているようでなによりだわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_070<tab>Who gave you permission to set off <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> the fireworks, you fool!? But I jest! I was hoping you would do just that. Why, I saw the sight from here, and I do believe it's safe to say that I am every ilm the genius that I always knew myself to be! Did the townspeople appreciate my masterwork as much I did?
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_070<tab>英雄の<var 08 E905 ((姉さん)) ((兄さん)) /var>、花火打ち上げてくれたんだね！
遠目からだけど、見えてたよ！
街のみんなも、喜んでくれていたかい？

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_071<tab>Of <var 1A 02 /var>course<var 1A 01 /var> they did! The incredible spectrum of colors, the unsurpassed elegance with which they dance and dart through the sky─only a fool or a blind man would fail to appreciate the spectacle!
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_071<tab>そりゃあ、良かった！
色はきれいに出ていたようだし、
あとの課題は、どんどん大きくしていくだけだな！

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_072<tab>But my true dream doesn't end there. Take a look at this beauty beside me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_072<tab>……ああ、<var 08 E905 ((姉さん)) ((兄さん)) /var>には、
理由も伝えず手伝ってもらって悪かったね。
ちょっとこいつを見ておくれよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_073<tab>Bertha here was my pride and joy when I served on the front lines. I couldn't count the number of times she saved me from the ravaging claws of the Horde.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_073<tab>この四連装対竜カノン砲は、私の相棒でね。
砲手として前線に出ていた頃には、
何度も私の命を救ってくれた。

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_074<tab>When the war ended, I figured she'd just end up all alone, collecting dust in the dark corner of some storehouse. So I offered to take her home myself, with the promise that I'd keep her well maintained and put her to good use─and my natural aptitude for pyrotechnics has allowed me to do just that.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_074<tab>でも、戦争が終われば相棒の出番はなくなるだろう。
そう思って、退役の折に花火に改造するからって条件で、
引き取らせてもらってね。

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_075<tab>We may no longer have need for weapons to shoot dragons out of the sky, but I mean to give Bertha here a new life shooting sheer beauty into the sky, and bringing joy and hope to the people of our nation.
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_075<tab>竜殺しの兵器は、もういらない。
これからは、戦うために身に着けた技術を応用して、
イシュガルドのみんなが喜ぶような花火を作っていきたいんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_076<tab>But why stop at Ishgard? Yes, one day I will journey across all of Eorzea with Bertha in tow, lighting up the skies in all corners of the realm with a spectacular rainbow of fiery blossoms!
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_076<tab>それだけじゃない、
最終的には、皇都だけでなくエオルゼア中を巡って、
でっかい花火を打ち上げてやろうじゃないか！

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_077<tab>For the part you've played in helping me realize my life's work, I thank you. As do, no doubt, all who will one day bear witness to the wonders that you have helped me introduce to the world!
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_077<tab>だから、英雄の<var 08 E905 ((姉さん)) ((兄さん)) /var>に手伝ってもらったんだ。
英雄が花火を打ち上げてくれたら、
みんなもっと喜んでくれるかなと思ってさ！

source: TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_078<tab>And with that, I give you leave to resume your travels. But wherever you roam, always look to the sky─for you never know when Edilaude's fabulous fireworks will return to grace your eyes once more!
target:
TEXT_LUCKHZ007_04005_EDILAUDE_000_078<tab>私のわがままに付き合ってくれてありがとな。
いつかエオルゼア中を驚かせるような花火を作ってみせるから、
そのときは英雄の<var 08 E905 ((姉さん)) ((兄さん)) /var>も見にきておくれよ！
